titleStmt.title: The coppy of a letter sent by William Laud Arch-Bishop of Canterburie, to the Universitie of Oxford wherein he relates his present condition, and resignes the office of his chancellourship : with an advertisement for the election of another.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
